name: Vessel General Specification:
description:
Vessel General Specification:

- Type : Horizontal, Cylindrical, Elliptic Head
- Design Code : ASME Sec VIII, Div.1
- Fluid : LPG
- Vessel Material : Carbon Steel
- Material Quality : EN 10028-3 / P 355 GH
- Approval : U Stamp


- Gross Capacity : 20.000 Liters
- Net Capacity : 17.000 Liters
- Gas Space : %85@mawp
- MAWP : 17,16 barg (Maximum Allowable Working Pressure)
- Design Pressure : 17,16 barg
- Design Temperature : -20 °C / +50 °C
- Material : EN 10028-3 / P 355 GH
- Radiographic Control : ACC.TO ASME Sec VIII, Div.1
- Heat Treatment : Only for heads
- Corrosion Allowance : 1mm
- Surface Roughness : Rz = (60 – 80)μ
- Sandblasting : Sa 2 ½

Accessories

- Magnetic Level Gauge FAS : 1pcs
- Rotogauge : 1pcs
- Rego RS3145 Safety Relief Valve : 2pcs
- Rego CD45 Check-Lock (for safety relief valve) : 2pcs
- Pakkens or Wika Manometer : 1pcs
- Rego 2884d Excess Flow Valve ¾”- ¼” : 1pcs
- Rego 3165 Ullage Valve (%85level) : 1pcs
- Omeva VRN20 Filling Valve : 1pcs
- Omeca VL25 Check-Lock : 2pcs
- Omeca RL25 Liquid Valve : 2pcs.
- Omeca GSE35 Multivalve : 1pcs

Dokumentation:
- Hydrostatic test certificate
- Final inspection report
- Manufacturer’s name plate
- Tank approval certificate
- Third party inspection reports
- Welding procedures and applications
- Radiographic reports
- Dye-penetrant reports
- Material certification
